website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a subtle, under cabinet range hood should check out this contemporary purchase from Chef.
pros: Many customers appreciate the modern design with built-in digital clock and touch screen
cons: Some owners noticed the item arrived damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Not even 500 CFM!
customer_reviews.text: Not even 500 CFM in the highest setting. Too noisy. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eva O

customer_reviews.title: One was DOA, that return was not a problem ...
customer_reviews.text: One was DOA, that return was not a problem. But the second I needed to initiate was an issue because they wouldn't cover the shipping charge. I'm a customer and return an item as big as a ranger hood is very expensive for me. And because they didn't provide an amazon-backed label, I had to pay out of pocket for the return fee, which was 1/4 of the cost of the item because of weight and size. The return was a big hassle.. The two that did arrive and I had installed are doing its job for the 2 months that have been in use. I have yet to clean the filters out yet. I'll update when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of research I decided that this was the unit to get and while I had high expectations I was let down. My main criteria was it’s ability to remove smoke, steam and odors while cooking. I followed all the instructions, have a great custom duct, etc. the reality is that If I stir fry on high heat or use a grill pan to grill a steak I still have to open all my windows of the house gets smokey. This unit is easy to install This unit looks nice This unit has an annoying chime This unit is very loud This unit doesn’t move smoke and fumes as well as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: aaronslittle

customer_reviews.title: I chose to believe that the complaints about this were ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose to believe that the complaints about this were outliers. They were not. Product arrived with no mounting information or hardware and a couple rivets missing. They must be selling "seconds." In any event I sent it back. It weighs over 40 lbs and didn't have the time to invest in figuring out how to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Not happy after 90 days
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, fits nicely and has a quiet operation. 9/12/2017 3 MONTH UPDATE 12/18/2017 Well cr*p, one of the diodes? has failed on the clock display, very annoying. What a job it will be to replace the unit. Also there is an audible 'whistle' when on the lowest fan setting only. Not happy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for the price. L-O-U-D
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice, especially with the LED lamps turned on. However there are some real problems with this model. - The airflow is much, much lower than advertised. - It is extremely loud. I mean REALLY load. The lowest speed is better, but moves next to zero air. - The front panel touch controls don't respond well. I expect this part to fail first. - The electrical connection is corded, which is time consuming to remove and connect house wiring to. My main concern is the touch-panel control. When it quits, the unit is shot, even if the rest of the appliance is fine. I would strongly prefer mechanical switches which have served us well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Halsan

customer_reviews.title: Great hood, atrocious clock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great as an budget option. I was quoted $800 for a similar looking unit locally, which was rated lower CFM. The only issue is that the built in clock is extremely inaccurate. In a couple of weeks it will be off by as much as 15 minutes. I don’t know what clock module was used to make this but it’s extremely low-grade. The important thing is, there’s no more smoke in my kitchen, so it only loses one star. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Haines

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction
customer_reviews.text: Awesome extractor. If you wrote a review saying the suction force is not enough you probably did something wrong during installation. Even at the lowest level it is stronger than my 200cfm microwave extractor. At Max power you get a strong blow standing 15ft away from the exhaust port on the outside wall!!! You can use this to generate drafts in the house. Seems to be good quality with proper finishes. Installation can be a pain because it is heavy and screw mou ting holes are not easily accessible. Definitely a must to have in a proper kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Suction isn’t very powerful. A little loud but expected. The really annoying stuff: There’s packaging styrofoam inside the clock display. The touch buttons are a little hard to press (not sensitive enough). I’m standing there pressing the power button 4-5 times to turn it on/off. Which isn’t too bad but enable to toggle the strength of the suction you’re pressing it about 10+ times to get from high to low (or vice verse). The worst part of this item is the poor time keeping. It loses a minute or 2 every 2 weeks. Which gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Suggest to bolt it onto position
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this hood provides all kinds of installation options for the users. I have installed many brands of range hoods and know of none other brands do such a thing. The hood is somewhat heavy. I did not use the screws provided and instead used bolt to hold it in place for easier installation. To screw this thing onto the bottom of the cabinet is awkward and challenging. Most cabinet will require extra pieces of woods to build up for the screws. The power cord should locate more toward the center instead of the edge. Otherwise decent product.
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I spent considerable time looking at Range Hoods and reviews before purchasing this model. I wanted something very quiet and vibration free, and reasonably priced. This was the one. The day it was delivered our handyman was over here working on other things. We installed it in about 2 hours. 15 minutes to get the Hood in place, the rest of the time cutting a hole in the cabinet above and a hole through the wall to exhaust the system. We turned it on high. No vibration, and very low noise from the fans. We are happy campers and glad we chose this model.
customer_reviews.author: STL Larry

customer_reviews.title: Designed like a commercial unit
customer_reviews.text: Designed like a commercial unit. Did not mention installation minimum height. Appearance is quite good, but it is quite heavy. Design does not allow for removal of much weight to lighten unit for easier installation. Hope I do not have a heat shut down problem as my installation will be below min height stated over gas stove. Now installed and operational, a little loud but sucked a fly which wandered in out at medium speed. No problems after use above gas stove and oven.
customer_reviews.author: stanC

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this might be the best money I’ve spent in a long time. I just finished installing my New hood. I fried 4 eggs with the door closed and no windows open and the house doesn’t smell. You can only smell it a couple feet away from the stove. I turn it on before I started and turned it off 5 minutes after I finished. If your not good with home projects I don’t recommend tackling this by yourself. Tools recommended for installation. 10” extension for your drill to run the screws in. A cabinet jack to hold it up. I purchased it off amazon. Search for 3rdhand. I’m pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Installed it last night,
customer_reviews.text: I like the styling, features and apparent build quality. I don't like that upon lightening up I found that dual intensity lighting system doesn't work, only one level available - I've been informed the manual is out of date. The 2 level intensity settngs is for earlier generation model using halogen lamps, my unit is an upgrade the has LED lamps with single inrtensity Also - manual leaves some things to be desired, no reference to the drip tray or how to install it and install would have been much easier if a template for the mounting screw locations was provided. How the defective light issue gets resolved.
customer_reviews.author: John ChiTown

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!! Won’t be sorry !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this exhaust fan. It arrived with out the tape so my husband called the help line number given. My husband was so blown away by the excellent service the company and their concern for their product !!! The gentleman was so apologetic to the issue and that the part would be delayed a bit because of the Presidents’ Day holiday. We couldn’t be more happier with this exhaust fan. It is so quiet, runs extremely well, and easy to take alert to clean !!! Soooooo glad we chose this fan. Easy to install by the way. Needed just a little help on both sides to install- that’s all !!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Solid range hood for the home kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is solid hood with very good suction power. It’s rated at 850 cfm, and doing a very good job compared to a 12 years old Hurricane hood. Noise level? It’s relatively quiet; acceptable to me at the highest speed. Stainless steel looks good and it’s a solid ~38 lbs piece of equipment, not cheap. Hood installation is hard, especially for the heavier ones as it’s very difficult to lift and hold it steady to mark holes for installation screws. There is no good leverage given the limited space over the stove. I used 2 car jacks + flat board to gain some leverage. Yes, it’s definitely 2- person job.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Functional design - Absolutely Best...
customer_reviews.text: Where do you start? T'was the easiest install I have experienced. And it makes such minimal noise even though its like 850 or so CFM's. Unheard of!! We thrilled we bought this gentle beast. Now its a couple of months, hope it lasts past a few years! We use the halogen light - Its so nice & bright it can light up our whole Kitchen! The accessories to shut the top hole and mount exhaust off the side is so user friendly - We did it with no sweat. Really nice cool innovation with very user friendly design - well worth the money. Good job guys designing this.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Installed ok except for the baffle unit (Top, round outlet). No instruction what so ever regard this piece. There are two rubber pieces that need to be removed and replaced AFTER you lay the baffle unit in place. There are also two rubber feet (in hindsight, I think there are supposed to be three) around the circumference of the round outlet that is supposed to keep the baffle from falling into the fan. They are useless. After several R&R of the complete unit, I am done. I will put up with the baffle hitting the fan as the fan starts and stops.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pulicicchio

customer_reviews.title: ... this unit (it was delivered damaged and Amazon were awesome about returning it without questions)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model after returning the Chef auto-cleaning model above this unit (it was delivered damaged and Amazon were awesome about returning it without questions). Having had both units, this is a better looking unit than the Auto Clean version, was a breeze to install, it works fantastically, and it appears to be easier to clean than the auto-clean version (which is ironic) since the baffle plates just come off easily for cleaning in the dishwasher. If you don't like hand cleaning parts you have to disassemble, this is the unit for you. :)
customer_reviews.author: jasond

customer_reviews.title: Good range hood with inconvenient sensor panel
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but the sensor panel is really inconvenient. It is not as responsive as the cell phone screens we are all accustomed too. You touch it with the tip of your finger and nothing happens. Then you do it again and again before it reacts. I was even going to give it 2 stars because of that but then I found that it works much better if you try to flatten your finger on it as if you want to give it the biggest fingerprint possible. But it is still inconvenient. Other than that, this is a perfect range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No mention of electrical setup. Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was pretty skimpy on this product. To my non-surprise, the unit was scratched and dinged in several places. In addition, I did not find anywhere in the instruction manual or the online listing to suggest that this unit is hardwired. Be advised, it is hardwired, NOT a plugin type. I really didn't want to pay an electrician for this - as I already have a dedicated plug for the microwave - so this was a disappointment. This unit will, unfortunately, have to go back. I hope this helps someone who is examining whether this unit is hardwired or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henderson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 inch venting duct. This range hood requires a 6 inch venting duct. He read the manual and shook his head. He estimates that he will need two days to install this hood. Right now, my husband is busy with a business project. Therefore, we have not installed yet. But the product arrived on time without any damages. Will update this review once it is installed and used for a few days. Hopefully, the manufacture warranty is still good in three months time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Hood!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Very powerful. Looks great. High setting a bit noisy but boy does it pull air! When compared to our old hood it’s still quieter on high than our old one on low. We have cleaned it once and it was easier than the old one we had. Keep in mind it’s very heavy when installing. There are two fans and motors so have a strong helper nearby when lifting it. We drilled two extra holes to mount it securely with bolts. Good instructions came with it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Todd

customer_reviews.title: The fan works great. It is quiet as I expected. I got the second one and they are both worth $
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great. It is quiet as I expected. I installed with the top air duct connection maybe that helps the air flow. No bad smell in the kitchen after all. I only don't like is the hole plan was missing in the box so I have to measure and make a hole plan so I can drill holes precisely. Lucky I had no mistake. The metal filters have 2 colors, I guess the outside part looks better then it is OK, I hope the inside part wont rush after a while. After 2 years, It still working well, so I bought again for my other family member.
customer_reviews.author: TINDALAND

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I’m missing part of this delivery. It’s the rear oil collection tray. I can’t find anyway to pursue this through Amazon. Who can help me? It looks like it’s gonna go in just fine. It seems to work really well. It did arrive damaged, but I was able to fix that and it won’t cause any problems. I don’t really want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Installation challenges
customer_reviews.text: Product would be much easier to install if it included a template so holes for attaching are drilled correctly from the beginning. Also, power cord is very close to screw hole causing hood to add to the challenges of installing. Positive outcome for us was the arm workout we received from the number of times we lifting the hood into place as we tried to line up the screws to the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Thick, quality steel, friendly controls, replaced a crappy Frigidaire. Fan is strong but without an irritating pitch or rattling (the temperament of noise is more important than its volume as all of them are noisy anyway). Overall feels well-made and looks great too. The first unit arrived damaged and had to be replaced. The replacement unit was slightly bent too but I fixed it myself. The quality of packaging and the transit damage associated with it is my only complain. Will see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: T.Y.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great power, but very very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Great power, but noisy. Does it's job very well (we cook daily with lots of stir frying etc). Very easy to clean. Just plop out the gills and rinse with hot water. LED display panel started burning out after just 3 months of use but the Manufacturer sent a replacement in just a day with a video on how to replace it (it's easy, you don't have to take the hood down).
customer_reviews.author: MarcTC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but installation was tricky
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself looks great, and is working great. At max power, the sound is reasonable. I like the LED lamps as I can turn them on instead of the main kitchen lights when watching TV at night in our adjoining family room. I only subtract one star for the hassle of installation. It is pretty straight forward (definitely a 2 person job), but DO yourself a favor, as another review said, and buy some long shaft Philip head screw bits, and maybe a small cabinet jack to assist in the install.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Difficult for DIY and design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Good product but has some serious design flaw as mentioned in previous reviews. I have to find an electrician to re-route the electric wire otherwise I cannot hang it flush undet the cabinet. The electric wire should came out to the left of the mounting hole! Whoever designed this range hood should at least install one to avoid such silly mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, easy install, flapper makes some noise
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy install, cleans up nicely, fan is metal and seems well built, timer off option is neat, only complaint is there is a bit of flapper noise (better than our old one, but seems avoidable with a little engineering or McGyvering). Great for the price, but not silent (fan is quiet, flapper is not). Husband thinks if we bend back the metal next to the hinge it may fix the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment with false product description.
customer_reviews.text: I have communicated with Chef Kitchen directly with my complaints and while the responses were timely, I feel they are far less than responsible. I can forward these statements directly to you. I believe it’s simply a matter of classical mis-representation of their product and doing nothing meaningful to rectify the issue. Very disappointed long term regular Amazon customer. George Wolf
customer_reviews.author: George M. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Lights do not dim.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well and looks great, however it arrived with 2 small dents in it and the description and manual that came with it say the lights have 3 settings, low high and off. Only high and off work, no dim function. The seller was contacted with pictures about both of these issues and it’s now almost a month later and no response from their customer service. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, poor suction.
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed contractor and I’ve installed plenty of exhausts. After spending two hours to customize and install with direct vent outside, the first trial was really bad. It did not remove smoke or Steam. Smoke alarm went off when we open the oven and it did not pull the smoke, it just bypassed from the front of the hood. My older $120 version from Home Depot did better than this unit. It’s well-built with a unique look but it doesn’t do the job properly. Extremely disappointed and I Will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rafi Baghdasarian

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good choice
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews stated, this is HEAVY. Doable, but it needs to be factored in. Absolutely should have two people to install. Not quiet but very efficient. The lowest suction is better than a conventional vent. The single disappointment, though maybe not really that important, is that there is only one light level. I have actually never seen another vent with only one light brightness and no variation. In terms of the essential, though, it is a great appliance.
customer_reviews.author: bi law

customer_reviews.title: The hood looks great when installed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hood according to the reviews. Hired a installer, and the installer was impressed by the first look with this price. The only complaint from the installer is that the top screws provided are shorter than expected and he has to find some longer ones. The hood looks great when installed. We prefer the 2nd level fan speed with quieter noise level and enough power. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy photo

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! powerful but quiet, the fan suction is positioned where needed, so vapors don't roll over the top and coat cabinetry. The lighting is bright and brighter, its great! Sleek look, easy to clean and simple touch controls. I have used everything from combo microwave venting to commercial restaurant grade venting. For the stir-fry and spicy cooking in my kitchen this is a dream machine! I spoke with customer service, who was polite, knowledgeable about the products and kindly advised me. This gave me confidence in them backing their product and is part of the reason I went for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hauslane is great quality
customer_reviews.text: After having chatted with Hauslane's customer support in South San Francisco, I made the decision to purchase their best range hood and now that it's installed I'm thrilled with the product. Heavy-duty stainless steel body and stainless steel baffle filters that can easily be removed for cleaning in the dishwasher. Very pleased with my new range hood. The fan is quieter than the cheap hood that it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Perry VoScott

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The mounting holes did not match up with my old unit, venting opening did not match up with my old vent, and plug was on opposite side of my old unit. My installer had to drill and cut my cabinet. But it is very nice looking unit and the dual exhaust fans are a plus. Dampers are much better than my old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: noise low compared to other range hoods I've had in the past
customer_reviews.text: we bought this range hood because we converted from electric to propane for cooking. I knew from the past my current range hood would not have enough CFM. Very happy with the decibel level. Also I very rarely need to use the full power because the suction is great even on the lowest setting. The other great feature is that it can support top exhaust or back exhaust... we needed back exhaust. Not many models offer that feature. The other great thing it shipped from California and shipped the day I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: MG - Franklin NC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong range hood. I was looking for something to replace my microwave range hood as part of a kitchen remodel. This has a great set of fans that make a huge difference. The fans are definitely audible when on at full speed. This just lets me know they are working and doing the job. The hood looks fantastic, and the touch panel controls are a nice touch. The hood came with all of the adapters to fit my vent box which was also an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: BobLobLaw

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying. After finishing the backsplash, I finally installed it yesterday. After using it, I feel that this product is better than the previous reviews. For example, the clock is changed to 12-hour format, and the touch screen is also very sensitive and does not need full contact. As long as they are very close, they can respond. The only problem that has occurred so far is that the clock is still working this morning, but the power button is frozen and not working. Finally, I unplugged the power and plugged it in again to return to normal operation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- looks great and is very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hood installed for the last couple of months now and just love it! It is very quiet and with its two fans has an amazing power to suck up cooking smoke/smells. Believe it or not... the PS18 30" hood has an infra-red receiver and I noticed that one of my cabinet light remote was able to control the hood operations too! When I called Hauslane's amazing customer service, they said it is sold separately ... so I bought one and made me love the new hood even more!
customer_reviews.author: A Virginian

customer_reviews.title: Great exhaust hood!
customer_reviews.text: It is so far better than my old exhaust hood that I was amazed at how well it worked. It's that Freight LED lighting and lots of suction. It is a little bit noisy when on the highest levels of fan speed but certainly does keep the smoke alarm from going off LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tom LeClerc W1TJL

customer_reviews.title: Best fit we could find
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a replacement for the broken range hood for 6 months now. This one does not exactly fit correctly under my upper cabinet (the cabinet comes quite a ways out over the front edge of the hood) but I like the light and how well the suction works and am very glad to have a hood again. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kurt Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Nice exhaust fan
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the vent hood. It's a pretty low profile one and has variable speeds for the fans which I like. Also the lights have 2 brightnesses to them, so I'm happy with that. It really lights up the stove when on full capacity. It does a good job on low, too. Now I just have to cook something to test out it's exhausting capabilities. Since I am still in the renovating stages it may be a while before I get to test that. Lol
customer_reviews.author: antkar

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The new hood works much better than our previous over the range microwave hood, but still not as powerful as commercial kitchen hood. You can still smell the food you are cooking outside of the kitchen, but it is so much better than our microwave hood before. Customer service is great. One of the flap fell during installation, I contacted Hauslane, they shipped me a replacement part for free, and it arrived quickly. Amazon is awesome. I ordered PS10 first, and then realized that it is only for vertical venting, our kitchen has rear venting. I returned PS10, and ordered PS18 (3 way venting) instead. Love Amazon's return options and we have a Whole Foods in Eugene.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful product only bad is hard to use  controls
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s really powerful and good quality. The touch controls not good, you have to press it couple time to adjust the fan speed. Also after setting time the clock time minutes counts down over time.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Finally no more smoke.
customer_reviews.text: During a kitchen remodel I replaced a non vented range hood with this one and as I look back on it, it is one of the best decisions I made. There is plenty of exhaust power in fact we rarely use full power and we have begun to do indoor grilling on the gas range and this unit handles the smoke with ease. The lighting is great as well. Of course, if you are replacing a non vented hood you will need to have that done. I went straight through the attic to roof vent and the cost was $250.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hood should give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works awesome. Noise level is great considering how much air it moves and it moves a lot. It got 4 stars because it is not 100% dishwasher safe. While the filters are stainless and dishwasher safe, the handles on them are anodized aluminum and not dishwasher friendly. The finish got damaged. See pic. Doesn't bother me but I was bummed.
customer_reviews.author: RxVedub

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of reviews and researched a lot of different hoods. When I receive this one and pulled it out of the box, it is built like a Sherman tank! I was amazed at the fabulous way this piece was put together, with threaded stainless steel screws and thick stainless steel. It is not as quiet as a church mouse, but considering the wonderful job it does sucking the fumes from my stove that's okay. For the price you cannot go wrong with this hood.
customer_reviews.author: Denis L Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Dropped right in to replace my old broken 30" hood. I bought it because it bad a rear exhaust option. Beat part is the LED lights, that provide nice bright illumination to the range below. Fan has lots of sped adjustments, and works great too! Best kitchen upgrade I have done ever! A quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: James Brittin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking range hood that compliments my new stove top. The unit is very heavy and it needed two people to do the installation. Bright LED lights, nice exhaust fan and overall very solid construction. I like the clock and the timer. For the money I consider this unit a good value and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ML for Romance

customer_reviews.title: Great product but was opened, scratched and bent
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and works as described but the frame was dented and the protective plastic was torn. I was able to bend the entire frame back into shape but there are still some small wrinkles that make it not look new. UPDATE: I am changing this from a 1 star to a 5 star because I could have returned it but I asked for a 15% discount. They were nice enough to give me 20% discount instead. And I can live with the mess up at that price. Thank you. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Daron Wall

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great
customer_reviews.text: It was packed well and so a lot of trash to throw out. I almost could install it allow. I need my wife to help sit it in my homemade jacks while I screwed it in place. The controls are a little confusing, and I still don't have the time set correct. Overall it looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: We installed this range hood as part of our kitchen renovation. This is a powerful fan! Our previous range hood was not effective and things in the kitchen got quite greasy. This range hood should solve that problem. I can now tell whats cooking when I am outside in the vicinity of the range hood vent. The range hood is attractive and looks great in our remodeled kitchen. If I had any complaint it is that the fans are loud. I think that is to be expected for a range hood with two powerful fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, wire on top next to screw hole is unsafe for installation.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly not designed by anyone who has ever hanged anything to a cabinet. The weight and design for installation is absurd for an item this size. Cheap Chinese junk again. Do yourself a favor and order a European or American made vent hood.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Worst installation experience
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good suction, good looking! But it took two of us (Both handyman) 3 hours to install! The instruction is so limited, and it does not include the drill hole and duct opening cut sheet so we have to manually lift the hood itself many times to mark the drill and cut position! And the final attach screws holes are almost impossible to reach since they are behind the fan. Really bad design for DIYers, but if you can find professionals to install it for you, it’s good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Cao

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and rattling sound!
customer_reviews.text: The auction seem good enough, but the noise level is loud on 5 and 6 setting. About 2 weeks of usage, I hear a weird noise (flapping rattling noise) like something is loose inside when I turn on the vent fan (1-6 setting), I don’t know what is causing it. The vent hood 2 led lights are good and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy Good Quality Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, Touch pad controls, sounds as expected and reasonable for the CFM, sucks good, easy to clean and Customer Service is excellent. Weights about 40 lbs. Comes with all output adapters (3.25" x 10" and 6" Round) and blanks. Has booth rear and top discharge. Bought this to replace my existing one. Can plug into outlet or hard wire. 6 Speeds.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money..
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why all the reviews claim this to be a wonderful product. It is really really loud, suction is ok at best (not the high cfm as it claims to be) and installation was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Solve55

customer_reviews.title: Light blown out in one day use!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing it is not 800 cfg. Second, the product is more expensive then its other competitors. I am very disappointed, the light is blown out at next day of installation. Check picture (right hand side light is blown)
customer_reviews.author: krishana gyanwali

customer_reviews.title: Good for Asian cooking style
customer_reviews.text: We changed our rangehood because the previous one was not efficient. This is perfect for for people who cook with oil everyday and do very heavy asian/indian style cooking. This keeps the smell out. The looks is good with touch control. Cons: This is very heavy and not easy to install. You must get this installed with professional.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Koshti

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, but this is a "plug" and not hardwired.  Very pleaed otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older unit that was hardwired, but the transition was no big deal. If you are minimally handy you can wire and install this unit, but will take 2 people. Minor modifications for securing it, but that's the price you pay when upgrading a 20 year old unit. It functions great, looks great and the filters are easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Overall very happy and would not even consider spending in excess of $700 just to match a name label with big name appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good cabinet range hood
customer_reviews.text: I order this to replace a microwave range hood that caused oil problems. I have used this for almost a month and it exceeds expectations. The installation and customer support when ordering the Under Cabinet Range Hood was very easy and straight forward. It does an amazing job at removing the smell and contaminants in the air. Not only does it work well but it looks very nice and is a great addition to my kitchen and is very easy to clean. Overall this has been a great product that has helped me when cooking and cleaning a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Micha Polak

customer_reviews.title: better than my old GE range hood, great product
customer_reviews.text: My purchase delivered via Prime in two days after I placed the order. It fit into my newly remodeled kitchen pretty well. My contractor installed it with no trouble. The setting interface is user friendly. I purchased Chef Kitchen to replace my old GE Montgomery 600 CFM range hood. The suck power and noise level are better than GE's. It would be nice if manufacturer could improve sharp edge at straight angle of Baffle filter to avoid hurting finger when wash it. Overall I am satisfying with this purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Goodman-Y

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Beast
customer_reviews.text: Very good unit. I was skeptic about installation and if my cabinet can hold 40 lbs. It was way easier that I thought, yes any standard cabinets would hold up this hood. I replaced the bulbs with 2 White GU10 LEDs, it is nice and bright now. Well build, the customer service is great (Calvin). Shop around for better price, I paid $40 more in Amazon, compared to wayfair & newegg, which I hope Amazon would refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Chandrashekaran

customer_reviews.title: Quiet range hood with high CFM
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quiet range hood with 860 CFM. Everything on the touch screen is good except the “ up “ botton is hard to touch, look like that botton is not sensitive enough. There is no remote control also. I don’t know how can I control the suction level if the touch screen is broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clock doesn’t keep time! Don’t like touchpad
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Worst problem is that the clock doesn’t keep time. Seriously. You set the time and check it the next day and it’s off by a few minutes. Lol. Then it keeps getting further and further off. So just get used to not look at the clock. Also, the touchpad is not easy to use and requires a firm push, not just a touch. Would rather have good old fashioned knobs and buttons.
customer_reviews.author: JORN ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Lovely powerful hood.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Chef 30PS18 under cabinet range hood to change week microwave ventilation.The item was packed perfect. This hood covers all stove and made very solid and looks good. It is powerful hood and has 5 speed good ventilation system and I would recommend to every one who spends a lot of time cooking.I am impressed with the filter's system. Enough light comes from two LED lights.My husband installed himself and says easy to do it. I am happy with this product .
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Better instructions and necessities, better diagrams
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install, but not as powerful as i thought, i used to have a 300cfm kitchen aid gallery series meaner than this one and powerfull motor lasted 22yrs and felt more powerfull than this one, but does the job, dont even know if u need to install it in a slope or leveled either. Its leveled now but i hope the grease travels to its pan. And not sit in the rails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hood has been working great for us
customer_reviews.text: The hood has been working great for us, but the touch screen has been a little flaky at times. I also replaced the light bulbs with what was recommended by Amazon as equivalent low voltage bulbs and now the hood behaves erratic at times turning lights on and off and randomly increasing/decreasing the fan speed and behavior like that.
customer_reviews.author: na

customer_reviews.title: Looks and cleans like a hood costing more than twice as much
customer_reviews.text: This hood looks and cleans like a commercial hood costing more than twice as much It’s been great and I love the clean lines and dishwasher safeparts
customer_reviews.author: Viki SSI

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and elegant range hood
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful and elegant range hood, excellent suction and illumination; it is also very good-looking. On the cons side I have to say that it is a bit heavy and challenging to install. Overall I am very satisfied about Chef 30” PS18 Under Cabinet Range Hood.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with the quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are pleased with the seller. Small issues upon arrival which the seler took care off. It took a while to install with the back output. I am not sure the power is as stated when using the back vent into the wall. It is not loud at all as some stated. Much better then our old microvawe. Looks amazing that I must say.
customer_reviews.author: Amz_Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: good looking hood vent
customer_reviews.text: good looking hood vent with nice digital display and 2 bright led lights. it has 6 speeds and plenty of power to remove cooking odors. the under mounts come off easily for cleaning. it came with both round and rectangular hood attachments for optional installment. it even has a tray in the back to collect potential evaporation. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works as expected. Expected better engineering. Clock not accurate; have to power on, then clock, then adjust speed down to desired low noise level. Installation was a pain. (Had to move wiring from prior good, then hold hood in place to secure.)
customer_reviews.author: Clifford A. DeMeritt

customer_reviews.title: Way more noisy at lower settings than mentioned by manfracturer's representative
customer_reviews.text: I checked the noise levels with one of the representatives of Chef Range Hoods (manufacturer) and the answer I got in email was: "Regarding the PS18 the maximum CFM is 860, and it is around 65Db at the maximum speed. The minimum speed is around 200CFM, and it is around 30Db." In reality at the minimum setting, dB is coming out to be 66db and and then it hovers around 70db for rest of the settings. Given that 'db' is lograthmic scale, that is a huge difference between claimed and reality. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Fits my cabin perfect and work perfect
customer_reviews.text: Use it to replace old microwave oven. Just install it by DIY, which needs at least two people. Bought 1/4 inch screws from Home Depot (Stronger than original ones) to hold this heavy range hood. Fits my cabin perfect and work perfect. Custom service always give immediate responses to my question.
customer_reviews.author: Ross X-L

customer_reviews.title: Nice hood!
customer_reviews.text: Nice hood! My kitchen is set up to where I needed a rear vent, so I scoured amazon for options that wouldn't sacrifice power and style. This baby was a beast to install, but my hubby and I managed to get it installed in about an hour. Very pleased with both form and function. Would gladly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry N.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but way munch less suction than I expected it had.
customer_reviews.author: Sissi. C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one fierce vent hood! In our application (short exhaust run) no steam or smoke escapes the hood, even at a fan speed of 3 (half speed). It looks great with a slight commercial appearance. Sound level is fine and for the price it is a great bargain. If I had the need I'd definitely purchase again. Can't say enough good about it.
customer_reviews.author: 2fargone

customer_reviews.title: It's a good unit and easy to install .
customer_reviews.text: I've had the product now and stall for about a week and is running great it was easy to install the only issue I have with the unit is the aluminum flap that the air exits the rear of the unit when it's above the lowest setting it rattles extremely bad other than that it's been a great unit one other issue is the LED lights that comes with or on the red side of the spectrum hope this review helps you make a decision
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet for the power, but more noisy if you use the rear ventilation rather than the top. Still easier on the ears than other models! Great suction with a lot of levels to choose from for your cooking needs. Glad our whole house doesn't smell like dinner when we are done! Installation was definitely a two person job, but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: raderrader

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and well built
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied although is a bit too noisy, but is a tradeoff since I wanted a lot of power. So far seams to be built with high quality materials. Came with all exhaust adaptor options and hardware, a hughe plus.
customer_reviews.author: CB1949

customer_reviews.title: The CFM and the noise level are very important parts of the unit.
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought this range hood Chef PS18. Its great product. Easy to install, great thing that Ducting adapters come with it. The electronic control panel not working properly with the button up level speed. I contacted the owner of product and they said they send another one to replace the panel with no charge. I am really appreciated this. Everything works great overall. I love the unit.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We recently renovated our kitchen and were looking for a range that had good suction for our gas stove and that was going to be quiet! After weeks of looking and researching we settled on the Chef 30" PS18 and are very happy with our purchase. It's quieter than I thought it would and actually clears cooking odors! It's a huge upgrade from our microwave range! 4 stars because it is a bit of a pain to install specially since it came with the protruding plug already attached.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Slim design but tough to install
customer_reviews.text: The hood had a nice slim under the counter design. Location of hole on top was too far back and close to wall for a proper 90 degree elbow connection inside the kitchen cabinet. Had to custom make my connection.
customer_reviews.author: Falomany

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great as well!
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the look and controls of the range hood. Installation was smooth . We tried cooking fried fish and with our earlier range hood we had to open all the doors and windows to not let the smell trap in but with this rangehood we didn't need to do that. We cook a lot of curry based Indian dishes and it has performed well. Glad that we made the decision to purchase Chef. The stainless steel look integrates well with our grey kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Arora

customer_reviews.title: High quality and modern look
customer_reviews.text: We replaced Chef 36” from GE Profile. It is a whole new world in our kitchen and home. Chef is high efficiency no more cooking smells and greasy kitchen. It was super easy to install. The product is beautiful and fitting perfect in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: YPC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend working with 2 jacks
customer_reviews.text: It works as I expected - Strong power, a little noisy. We only have 2 guys to install it and it was very hard. I knew it was heavy and big. But I did not realize it took 2 men about 4 hours. Its power cord is at a different position from my previous one so I made a hole with a line at the outer side on the bottom of the cabinet. When we tried to hook it on the screws, it was hard and we try-put it down-adjust-try again for 4 times. Highly recommend working with 2 jacks but not carrying by people - people is not stable.
customer_reviews.author: Fei

customer_reviews.title: Lights and fan work very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Multiple ventilation options. Would have helped with installation if there was side to side flexibility in back ventilation placement.
customer_reviews.author: Hgiel

customer_reviews.title: Great hood for the price. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Just install and use the hood in the last 3 days. It is very high quality heavy stainless still material. It is much more powerful quite compare to my old 800 CFM Pacific hood. I like second lowest speed better because the lowest once there is little motor humming noise if i pay attention to it. I wish the hood line is LED instead of halogen.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this range hood to everyone. I love the lights, the quiet fans and installation was much easier than anticipated. It is a two guy install just because of the size. The old fan drove me crazy with the noise. This one has six settings but the power is so great I doubt I'll need more than the two lowest settings. Great contemporary look and again the lights make cooking a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED - GASH IN BOX AND 1 OF 3 GRILLS BENT
customer_reviews.text: I TOOK PICTURES BUT NOT SURE HOW TO SEND THEM - ONE DAMPER (SHEET METAL ) & 1 OF 3 VENT GRILLS BENT!
customer_reviews.author: blucrab

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: The screws are too short to install. We had to re-buy 4 longer screws. This range hood is very heavy to install.
customer_reviews.author: nj

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an old vent. The noise level is the same as any other vents. We loved the control panel. It’s very easy to use. The suctioning works great. We don’t smell anything after we cooked. The quality of the vent is good. We’re glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Chef 36" Under Cabinet Range Hood PS18
customer_reviews.text: We are in the beginning stages of our kitchen update. One part of this is replacing the very old and outdated range insert. We needed one that looked great, was built well and had a variety of CFM/fan options. Cleaning was also a factor in our buying decision. The CHEF 36" hood met our needs and then some! The hood was packed well and delivered safely. Tested the unit and everything works fine. The 6 speed fan will be put to good use as we do A LOT of cooking! Easy cleanup too with the removable filters! Hope to share more photos when we are finished with the update.
customer_reviews.author: WOWZERS!

customer_reviews.title: Like my new Chef 36" Range Hood but...
customer_reviews.text: I can't give it all 5 stars because the 'up' button, the touch button that turns up the fan speed, barely works. You really have to press and re-press it until it finally reacts. I would send it back for replacement but I'm at the end of my kitchen remodel (whew!) and it would be a HUGE HASSLE to take it down and send it back. It works occasionally - I'll just have to deal with it. Other than that it seems to be a good product. A shame it's ruined by a faulty button. Just pray it doesn't get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Too much noise and too little suction - avoid this product please
customer_reviews.text: This product makes lot of noise. When it is on, kitchen sounds like a factory. I see the fumes going around the kitchen. Very low suction power. Very easy to install though. I have replaced microwave-undermount with this product. Fits perfectly into the space and exhaust duct that is already in place.
customer_reviews.author: Anjaneyulu Jonnala

product_meta.title: Hauslane | Chef Series 30" PS18 Under Cabinet Range Hood, Stainless Steel | Pro Performance | Contemporary Design, Touch Screen, Dishwasher Safe Baffle Filters, LED Lamps, 3-Way Venting
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY MODERN DESIGN: Full stainless steel body with digital screen that integrates beautifully with your kitchen remodel.
POWERFUL VENTILATION WITH DELAY SHUT-OFF: Customize your Hauslane range hood with the 6 speed setting to play with the suction and noise level.
THREE-WAY VENTING: Vertical venting: 6” round adapter or 10” x 3-1/4” rectangular adapter; Rear venting: 10” x 3-1/4” rectangular adapter.
DISHWASHER SAFE FILTERS: Hauslane’s Chef Series 30in range hood is designed with easy-to-remove stainless steel baffle filters. Just place in the dishwasher to clean!
BRIGHT ENERGY SAVING LAMPS: LED lamps help save energy in your kitchen while emit enough lights to meet your cooking need.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars850 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
